function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for epidemics and pandemics in conceptual frameworks","Impact":"Inadequate response to contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Include epidemics and pandemics as landscape shocks in conceptual frameworks","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective messaging about contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of widespread misinformation and ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Develop culturally relevant and effective messaging about contagious diseases","Technologies":"Communication technology, social media analytics tools","People":"Public health agencies, communication professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, communication firms"},{"Description":"Inappropriate adaptation of pandemic messages to local culture","Impact":"Misrepresentation of pandemic seriousness and appropriate containment measures","Mitigation":"Ensure that culturally adapted messages accurately convey the seriousness of the pandemic and the need for appropriate measures","Technologies":"Cultural sensitivity training, cultural impact assessment tools","People":"Communication professionals, cultural experts","Owner":"Communication firms, cultural organizations"}]}
